sections.name: Mission and Values
sections.description: A prominent section highlighting BKF Pharma's mission and values, showcasing the company's dedication to innovative cancer treatment.

sections.name: Innovative Work
sections.description: Information about the cutting-edge work being done at BKF Pharma in cancer treatment, presented without revealing sensitive research details.

sections.name: Company Overview
sections.description: A detailed overview of BKF Pharma, including its history, mission, and vision, providing visitors with a comprehensive understanding of the company.

sections.name: Team
sections.description: Information about the key team members at BKF Pharma, highlighting their roles and contributions to the company's mission.

sections.name: Contact Form
sections.description: A form for potential partners, investors, and other interested parties to get in touch with the BKF Pharma team easily.

sections.name: Contact Information
sections.description: Details for direct contact, including email, phone number, and physical address.

sections.name: News and Updates
sections.description: A section dedicated to keeping visitors informed about the latest developments and news from BKF Pharma.
